TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartConnection extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一个对象，该对象可使两个 控件形成连接。

span.span: Provides an object that enables two controls to form a connection.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 部件控件集中, 连接是允许它们共享数据的两个 (或其他服务器或用户) 控件之间的链接或关联。In the Web Parts control set, a connection is a link or association between two (or other server or user) controls that enables them to share data. 这种共享数据的功能允许使用连接的控件, 以超出独立控件提供的功能。This ability to share data allows connected controls to be used in ways that exceed the functionality offered by the isolated controls. 例如, 如果一个控件提供了邮政编码数据, 另一个控件可以读取该数据, 并根据邮政编码提供本地天气信息, 则这两个控件的连接功能为用户提供了更多价值。For example, if one control provides postal code data, and another control can read that data and provide local weather information based on the postal code, then the connected capability of the two controls provides more value to users. 若要扩展此示例, 还可以创建其他控件, 该控件还可以基于邮政编码显示信息 (例如具有指向本地新闻的链接的控件), 并且所有可以使用邮政编码数据的控件可以与提供邮政编码。To extend this example, other controls could be created that also display information based on a postal code, such as a control with links to local news, and all these controls that can work with postal code data could share data with the single control that provides a postal code. Web 部件应用程序的最终用户可以使用控件提供的标准连接用户界面 (UI) 或使用提供的自定义 UI, 直接从 Web 浏览器创建和管理所有此类兼容控件之间的连接。开发.End users of Web Parts applications can create and manage connections between all such compatible controls directly from a Web browser, using the standard connections user interface (UI) provided by the control, or using a custom UI provided by a developer. 此类概述是有关创建连接的基本详细信息的一般说明。This class overview is a general statement of the basic details for creating a connection. 有关创建连接所涉及的特定组件和要求的详细信息, 请参阅[Web 部件连接概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178187(v=vs.100)), 或参阅以下讨论中提到的引用类和代码示例。For more on specific components and requirements involved in creating connections, see [Web Parts Connections Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178187(v=vs.100)), or see the reference classes and code examples mentioned in the following discussion. Web 部件连接有几个基本方面:There are several fundamental aspects of a Web Parts connection: - 两个控件。Two controls. 每个 Web 部件连接都包含两个控件。Every Web Parts connection consists of two controls. 控件可以同时参与多个连接, 但每个单一连接只包含两个控件。It is possible for a control to participate in more than one connection simultaneously, but every single connection consists of exactly two controls. 控件可以直接派生自基类, 也可以是其他服务器控件, 包括 ASP.NET 控件、自定义服务器控件和用户控件。The controls can derive directly from the base class, or they can be other server controls, including ASP.NET controls, custom server controls, and user controls. 不 是从类派生的控件 (如果置于区域中) 将在运行时自动使用对象进行包装,这使它们可以从类继承并作为运行时函数控件.Controls that do not derive from the class, if placed in a zone, are automatically wrapped with a object at run time, which enables them to inherit from the class and function as run-time controls. - 位于区域中的控件。Controls residing in zones. 控件和任何其他类型的服务器控件都必须驻留在某个区域中, 以便能够参与 Web 部件连接 (以及大多数其他 Web 部件功能)。 Both controls and any other type of server control must reside in a zone to be able to participate in Web Parts connections (and most other Web Parts features). - 使用者和提供者。Consumers and providers. 在每个 Web 部件连接中, 有两个控件: 数据提供程序和数据使用者。In every Web Parts connection there are two controls: a provider of data and a consumer of data. 提供程序通过指定的回调方法将数据 furnishes 到使用者, 该方法以接口的形式返回数据。The provider furnishes data to the consumer through a specified callback method that returns data in the form of an interface. (有关如何创建和指定回调方法的示例, 请参阅本主题的 "示例" 部分。)此回调方法被称为提供程序连接点。(For an example of how to create and specify the callback method, see the Example section of this topic.) This callback method is known as a provider connection point. 与提供程序控件关联的对象中包含此连接点 (其 "友好" 名称、ID 和返回接口的类型) 的详细信息。The details of this connection point (its "friendly" name, an ID, and the type of the returned interface) are contained in a object associated with the provider control. 使用者通过可接受接口实例的指定方法接收数据。The consumer receives the data through a specified method that can accept an instance of the interface. 此方法称为使用者连接点, 连接点的详细信息 (名称、ID 和接口类型) 包含在与使用者控件关联的对象中。This method is known as a consumer connection point, and the details of the connection point (name, ID, and type of interface) are contained in a object associated with the consumer control. - 兼容的控件或有效的转换器。Compatible controls or a valid transformer. 要使连接正常运行, 使用者和提供程序必须兼容 (表示其指定的连接点方法可以使用相同类型的接口), 或者必须有一个对象能够转换由提供程序到使用者识别的类型。For a connection to work, the consumer and provider must either be compatible (meaning that their specified connection point methods can work with the same type of interface), or there must be a object capable of translating the type offered by the provider into a type understood by the consumer. - 一个 对象。A object. 若要连接到存在, 必须有一个类的实例, 该类包含对提供者和使用者控件的引用以及其连接点的详细信息。For a connection to exist, there must be an instance of the class that contains references to the provider and consumer controls, along with the details of their connection points. 如果提供程序和使用者不兼容, 而是使用对象进行连接, 则连接将引用转换器。If the provider and consumer are incompatible and instead use a object to connect, the connection references the transformer. - 建立连接的方式。A means of establishing the connection. 在兼容的使用者和提供者控件已经正确地使用连接点方法设计并将其放置在某个区域中并且对象可用时, 最后一个必要的基本步骤是启动连接。After compatible consumer and provider controls have been properly designed with connection point methods and placed in a zone, and a object is available, the last basic step necessary is to initiate the connection. 这种情况的一种方法是让用户通过 UI 创建连接。One way this can happen is for users to create the connection through the UI. 如果在页面上``放置一个元素, 并且连接的其他必需组件已就位, 则在运行时, 用户可以将页面切换为连接显示模式, 单击提供者或使用者的谓词菜单上的连接谓词。和将显示连接 UI (基于控件)。If you place an `` element on the page, and the other required components for a connection are in place, at run time a user can switch the page into connect display mode, click a connect verb on the verbs menu of either the provider or consumer, and a connection UI (based on the control) will appear. 通过此 UI, 用户可以启动连接。Through this UI, the user can initiate the connection. 发起连接的另一种方法是以编程方式执行此操作。Another way to initiate the connection is to do it programmatically. 无论是通过 UI 还是以编程方式, 启动连接的基础方法都是相同的。In either case, whether through the UI or programmatically, the underlying method that initiates the connection is the same. 应用程序调用 控件上的方法 ( 或方法, 如果使用转换器), 向其传递提供程序、使用者及其各自的连接点对象, 方法将返回对象.The application calls the method (or the method if using a transformer) on the control, passing to it the provider, the consumer, and their respective connection point objects, and the method returns a object. 类定义一个对象, 该对象封装两个控件之间的连接的基本详细信息。 The class defines an object that encapsulates the essential details of a connection between two controls. 类几乎完全由与特定连接的详细信息相关的属性组成。The class consists almost entirely of properties related to the details of a particular connection. 多个属性涉及连接中的使用者控件。Several properties concern the consumer control in a connection. 属性引用使用者控件本身, 属性引用使用者的 ID。 The property references the consumer control itself, and the property references the consumer's ID. 对象 (包含使用者的连接点的详细信息) 由使用者的属性引用。 The object, which contains the details of the consumer's connection point, is referenced by the consumer's property. 属性引用对象的 ID。 The property references the ID of the object. 所有这些使用者相关的连接属性必须分配有值才能创建连接。All these consumer-related connection properties must have a value assigned to them to create a connection. 类还具有几个与连接中的提供程序控件相关的属性, 这些属性对应于使用者的属性。The class also has several properties that relate to the provider control in a connection, and these correspond to the properties for a consumer. 属性引用提供程序控件本身, 而属性引用其 ID。 The property references the provider control itself, while the property references its ID. 属性引用对象,属性引用提供程序的连接点的 ID。 The property references the object, and the property references the ID of the provider's connection point. 几个属性涉及连接状态。Several properties concern the state of the connection. 属性指示连接是否处于活动状态 (当前正在交换的数据) 或非活动状态 (仍处于连接状态, 但未主动共享数据)。The property indicates whether the connection is active (currently exchanging data) or inactive (still connected but not actively sharing data). 属性指示连接是否为共享的 (可用于页面的所有用户) 或特定于用户的连接, 属性指示控件是静态的 (在页标记中声明, 因此是永久性的) 或动态 (以编程方式创建, 表示可以删除)。The property indicates whether the connection is a shared (available to all users of a page) or a user-specific connection, and the property indicates whether the control is static (declared in the page markup and thus permanent) or dynamic (created programmatically, meaning that it can be deleted). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建两个控件之间的简单连接。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple connection between two controls. 该示例演示了形成连接的三种方式: 以声明方式将连接的标记放置在网页的标记中;通过以编程方式在代码中创建连接;通过 UI, 通过将控件置于页面上, 使用户能够建立连接。The example demonstrates three ways of forming a connection: declaratively, by placing tags for the connection in the markup of the Web page; programmatically, by creating the connection in code; and through the UI, by placing a control on the page, which enables users to establish a connection. 此代码示例包含四个部分:The code example has four parts: - 允许您在页上更改 Web 部件显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载所有控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到 .ascx 文件, 并为其提供分配给`Src`此用户控件的`Register`指令属性的文件名, 该属性位于宿主网页的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 此代码示例的第二部分是接口和控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface and controls. 源文件包含一个名为`IZipCode`的简单接口。The source file contains a simple interface named `IZipCode`. 还有一个名为`ZipCodeWebPart`的类, 该类实现接口并充当提供程序控件。There is also a class named `ZipCodeWebPart` that implements the interface and acts as the provider control. 它`ProvideIZipCode`的方法是实现接口的唯一成员的回调方法。Its `ProvideIZipCode` method is the callback method that implements the interface's only member. 方法只返回接口的实例。The method simply returns an instance of the interface. 请注意, 该方法在其元`ConnectionProvider`数据中用特性标记。Note that the method is marked with a `ConnectionProvider` attribute in its metadata. 这是将方法标识为提供程序连接点的回调方法的机制。This is the mechanism for identifying the method as the callback method for the provider's connection point. 其他类命名`WeatherWebPart`为, 它充当连接的使用者。The other class is named `WeatherWebPart`, and it acts as the consumer for the connection. 此类具有一个名为`GetZipCode`的方法, 该方法从`IZipCode`提供程序控件获取接口的实例。This class has a method named `GetZipCode` that gets an instance of the `IZipCode` interface from the provider control. 请注意, 此方法在其元数据中被标记为使用者`ConnectionConsumer`的连接点方法和属性。Note that this method is marked as the consumer's connection point method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in its metadata. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是用户控件`Register`和自定义控件的指令。Near the top are the `Register` directives for the user control and the custom controls. 由于本示例假定控件的动态编译, 因此控件的源代码应位于 App_Code 子文件夹中;页`Register`中的标记只引用任意标记前缀和控件的命名空间。Because the example assumes dynamic compilation of the controls, the source code for the controls should be in an App_Code subfolder; the `Register` tag in the page references only an arbitrary tag prefix and the namespace of the controls. 自定义控件 (提供程序和使用者) 在网页的``元素``内的元素中声明。The custom controls (the provider and consumer) are declared within the Web page's `` element, inside a `` element. 页面提供了三种方式来形成自定义控件之间的连接。The page provides three ways to form a connection between the custom controls. 第一种方法是声明性的。The first method is declarative. 在该页的标记中, 将声明``一个元素, 并在该``元素中声明一个元素, 其中包含指定为特性的连接的各种使用者和提供程序详细信息。In the markup for the page, a `` element is declared, and within that is an `` element, with the various consumer and provider details of the connection specified as attributes. 这是一种创建连接的方法, 它是在网页中直接声明的`` , 特别是在元素中。This is one way to create a connection, by declaring it directly in the Web page, specifically within the `` element. 由于这种静态连接, 因此在第一次加载页面时, 将立即创建两个自定义控件之间的连接。Because of this static connection, a connection between the two custom controls is created immediately the first time the page loads. 用于在控件之间形成连接的另一种方法由页中``的元素提供。A second method for forming a connection between the controls is provided by the `` element in the page. 如果用户在运行时将页面切换为连接显示模式, 并在其中一个自定义控件上单击连接谓词, 则``元素会自动呈现用于创建连接的 UI。If a user switches a page into connect display mode at run time, and clicks a connect verb on one of the custom controls, the `` element automatically renders the UI for creating a connection. 此页还演示了创建连接的第三种方法, 即以编程方式执行该连接。The page also demonstrates a third way of creating a connection, which is to do it programmatically. 在方法中, 代码为提供程序控件创建一个对象, 并通过调用方法检索其连接点详细信息。 `Button1_Click`In the `Button1_Click` method, the code creates a object for the provider control, and retrieves its connection point details by calling the method. 它为使用者控件执行类似的任务, 并调用方法。It carries out a similar task for the consumer control, calling the method. 最后, 它通过对 控件调用方法来创建新的对象。Finally, it creates the new object by calling the method on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载网页后, 第一个连接已存在, 因为它是在``元素中声明的。After you load the Web page in a browser, the first connection already exists because it is declared within the `` element. 在**邮政编码提供程序**控件中输入一些文本, 该文本将显示在使用者控件中。Enter some text in the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and it will be displayed in the consumer control. 接下来, 将两个控件断开连接。Next, disconnect the two controls. 使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件更改页面以连接显示模式。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, change the page to connect display mode. 单击每个控件的谓词菜单 (由标题栏中的向下箭头表示), 注意每个控件都有一个**连接**选项。Click the verbs menu (represented by a downward arrow in the title bar) for each of the controls, and notice that each has a **Connect** option. 这是一个连接谓词, 仅当页面处于连接模式时, 它才会出现在谓词菜单中。This is a connect verb, which appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in connect mode. 单击其中一个控件上的连接谓词, 此时将显示控件提供的连接用户界面。Click the connect verb on one of the controls, and the connection UI provided by the control appears. 单击 "**断开连接**" 按钮以结束控件之间的静态连接。Click the **Disconnect** button to end the static connection between the controls. 使用 "**显示模式**" 控件将页面返回到浏览模式。Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode. 再次尝试在提供程序中输入一些新文本, 请注意, 由于控件已断开连接, 因此无法在使用者控件中更新文本。Try to enter some new text in the provider again, and note that because the controls are disconnected, the text fails to update in the consumer control. 接下来, 使用与上面相同的方法再次将页面切换到连接显示模式。Next, use the same method as above to switch the page into connect display mode again. 单击其中一个控件上的连接谓词。Click a connect verb on one of the controls. 单击 "**创建连接**" 链接, 并使用控件提供的 UI 在控件之间创建连接。Click the **Create a Connection** link, and use the UI provided by the control to create a connection between the controls. 这是创建连接的第二种方法。This is the second method for creating a connection. 请注意, 一旦建立连接, 就会突然在提供程序控件中输入的最后一个字符串 (由于控件断开连接而无法显示), 因为该连接已重新创建。Note that as soon as the connection is formed, the last string you entered in the provider control (that failed to appear because the controls were disconnected) suddenly appears in the consumer, because the connection has been recreated. 单击 "**断开连接**" 按钮以结束刚才创建的当前连接。Click the **Disconnect** button to end the current connection that you just created. 将页返回到浏览模式。Return the page to browse mode. 在提供程序中输入一些新文本, 以演示文本未更新并且控件再次断开连接。Enter some new text in the provider to demonstrate that the text is not updated, and that the controls are again disconnected. 返回页面以连接显示模式。Return the page to connect display mode. 请单击 "**连接" Web 部件控件**按钮, 而不是单击连接谓词, 其中显示了形成连接的第三种方法。Instead of clicking a connect verb, click the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, which illustrates the third method of forming a connection. 此方法在一个简单的步骤中以编程方式连接控件, 而无需使用控件。This approach connects the controls programmatically in one simple step without having to use the control. 请注意, 在创建连接时, 在提供程序中输入的最后一个字符串会突然出现在使用者控件中。Note that as the connection is created, the last string you entered in the provider suddenly appears in the consumer control.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是公共的, 以便在网页的标记中声明连接时, ASP.NET 分析器可以创建实例; 此构造函数不能在开发人员代码中使用。The constructor is public so that the ASP.NET parser can create an instance when a connection is declared in the markup of a Web page; this constructor is not intended to be used in developer code. 如果要以编程方式创建对象, 则应使用控件中提供的或方法。When you want to create a object programmatically, you should use the or the method provided in the control. 这些方法处理创建连接的多个细节, 并返回一个对象。These methods handle the many details of creating a connection, and return a object. 类的构造函数`true`将和属性的值设置为。 The constructor for the class sets the values of the and properties to `true`. 因此, 新连接的默认状态为静态 (意味着它在包含网页的标记中声明) 和共享 (对该页的所有用户可见)。Thus the default state of a new connection is to be static (meaning that it is declared in the markup of the containing Web page) and shared (visible to all users of the page). 在典型方案中添加连接时, 会出现这种情况, 方法是使用``元素在页面的标记中声明连接。This will be the case when you add a connection in the typical scenario, by declaring the connection in the markup of the page with an `` element. 但在其他情况下, 连接的这些属性的值将不同。However, in other circumstances a connection will have different values for these properties. 例如, 当你通过在代码中创建连接对象来以编程方式添加连接, 并且用户在默认用户个性化设置范围内查看该页时, 连接将创建为动态的每个用户 (仅对特定用户可见)连接.For example, when you add a connection programmatically by creating the connection object in code, and the user is viewing the page in the default user personalization scope, the connection is created as a dynamic, per-user(visible only to the specific user) connection. > [!NOTE] > 和 属性是只读的, 并且这些用于确定连接特性的属性是由控件在内部设置的, 具体取决于创建连接的方式 (在页标记中以声明方式声明, 或以编程方式通过你的代码或用户界面。The and properties are read-only, and these properties that determine the nature of a connection are set internally by the control depending on how a connection is created (declaratively in the page markup, or programmatically through your code or the user interface).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Consumer As WebPart

summary.span: 获取一个作为连接中的使用者控件的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that is acting as the consumer control in a connection.

value.span: 一个 ，表示作为连接中的使用者的 Web 部件控件。

span.span: A that represents the Web Parts control acting as the consumer in a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 Web 部件连接包含共享数据的两个控件。Every Web Parts connection consists of two controls that share data. 一个控件充当数据的提供程序, 另一个控件作为使用者, 接收和处理来自提供程序的数据。One control acts as the provider of data, and the other control acts as a consumer, receiving and processing the data from the provider. 属性获取对在连接关系中充当使用者的控件的引用。 The property gets a reference to the control acting as a consumer in a connection relationship. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property. 此代码示例包含四个部分:The code example has four parts: - 允许您在页上更改 Web 部件显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载所有控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到 .ascx 文件, 并为其提供分配给`Src`此用户控件的`Register`指令属性的文件名, 该属性位于宿主网页的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 此代码示例的第二部分是作为使用者和连接的提供程序的两个控件的源代码, 以及用于连接点的接口。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two controls that serve as the consumer and the provider for the connection, and an interface used for the connection points. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第三部分是承载控件的网页的代码, 并演示属性的用法。The third part of the code example is the code for the Web page that hosts the controls and demonstrates the use of the property. 页面顶部附近是用户控件和自`Register`定义控件的指令。Near the top of the page are the `Register` directives for the user control and the custom controls. 由于本示例使用动态编译, 因此`Register`源文件的指令不需要引用程序集名称; 它只包含控件的任意标记前缀和命名空间。Because this example uses dynamic compilation, the `Register` directive for the source file does not need to reference an assembly name; it includes only an arbitrary tag prefix and the namespace of the controls. 在方法中, 代码通过控件访问连接对象, 并获取对使用者控件的引用。 `Button2_Click`In the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the connection object through the control, and gets a reference to the consumer control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面后, 请使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件将页面切换到连接模式。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode. 单击其中一个控件上的谓词菜单 (由标题栏中的向下箭头表示), 然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 使用 "**连接" WebPart 控件**按钮或提供的连接用户界面 (UI) 来创建两个控件之间的连接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, or the provided connection user interface (UI), to create a connection between the two controls. 单击 "**显示使用者信息**" 按钮, 以运行演示属性的代码。Click the **Display Consumer Info** button to run the code that demonstrates the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConsumerConnectionPoint As ConsumerConnectionPoint

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象作为连接中充当使用者的控件的连接点。

span.span: Gets the object that serves as a connection point for a control that is acting as a consumer in a connection.

value.span: 与连接中的使用者控件关联的 。

span.span: A associated with the consumer control in a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在两个控件之间创建连接所必需的步骤之一是为每个控件创建连接点。One of the required steps for creating a connection between two controls is to create connection points for each control. 使用者连接点是一个对象, 其中包含有关如何连接到作为使用者的控件的信息。The consumer connection point is an object that contains the information about how to connect to the control acting as a consumer. 在使用者的源代码中, 必须使用`ConnectionConsumer`属性标识其中一种方法。In the consumer's source code, one of the methods must be identified with the `ConnectionConsumer` attribute. 与使用者控件关联的对象包含有关方法和属性的详细信息, 包括方法的 ID、用于用户界面 (UI) 的显示名称, 以及该方法可以检索的接口类型。The object that is associated with a consumer control contains details about the method and the attribute, including an ID for the method, a display name for use in the user interface (UI), and what type of interface the method can retrieve. 这组有关使用者的信息、其建立连接的方法以及它理解的接口类型, 共同形成了一个使用者连接点。This set of information about the consumer, its method for forming connections, and the type of interface it understands, collectively forms a consumer connection point. 默认情况下, 对象一次只能连接到一个对象。By default, a object can connect to only one object at a time. 使用者可以将多个方法标识为可能使用者连接点, 但使用者只能以一个使用者的身份 (因此, 它的一个使用者连接点只能处于活动状态)。A consumer could have multiple methods identified as possible consumer connection points, but a consumer can only participate in one connection as a consumer (hence, only one of its consumer connection points can be active) at a time. 与此相反, 可以连接到任意数量的对象。In contrast, a can connect to any number of objects. 可以通过重写属性 上的属性来更改此默认行为。This default behavior can be changed by overriding the property on the attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property. 该示例包含四个部分:The example has four parts: - 允许您在页上更改 Web 部件显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载所有控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到 .ascx 文件, 并为其提供分配给`Src`此用户控件的`Register`指令属性的文件名, 该属性位于宿主网页的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 此代码示例的第二部分是作为使用者和连接的提供程序的两个控件的源代码, 以及用于连接点的接口。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two controls that serve as the consumer and the provider for the connection, and an interface used for the connection points. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第三部分是承载控件的网页的代码, 并演示属性的用法。The third part of the code example is the code for the Web page that hosts the controls and demonstrates the use of the property. 在方法中, 创建建立连接所需的所有对象 ( 包括对象)。 `Button1_Click`In the `Button1_Click` method, all the objects required to form a connection are created, including a object. 这些对象都传递到方法以创建连接。These objects are all passed to the method to create the connection. 在方法中, 代码访问属性, 并显示连接点的一些详细信息。 `Button2_Click`In the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the property and displays some details of the connection point. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面后, 请使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件将页面切换到连接模式。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode. 单击其中一个控件上的谓词菜单 (由标题栏中的向下箭头表示), 然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 使用 "**连接" WebPart 控件**按钮或提供的连接 UI 在两个控件之间创建连接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, or the provided connection UI, to create a connection between the two controls. 单击 "**器详细信息**" 按钮以运行演示属性的代码。Click the **ConnectionPoint Details** button to run the code that demonstrates the property.

member this.ConsumerConnectionPointID : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置连接上的属性值，该值引用作为该连接的使用者连接点的对象的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the object serving as the consumer connection point for that connection.

value.span: 包含使用者连接点的 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID for the consumer connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于在网页的标记中声明的静态连接, 开发人员可以通过为`ConsumerConnectionPointID` ``元素的特性指定值来指定将用于连接的使用者连接点。For a static connection declared in the markup of a Web page, developers can specify which consumer connection point will be used for the connection by assigning a value to the `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attribute on the `` element. 如果未将值分配给属性, 则使用属性值。If a value is not assigned to the attribute, the property value is used. 创建动态 (编程) 连接时, 通常不应设置属性的值。When you create dynamic (programmatic) connections, normally you should not set the value of the property. 只需调用控件上的方法, 将其传递给使用者和使用者连接点对象 (以及其他所需的参数), 该方法就会确定要用于使用者连接的正确 ID。情况.You can simply call the method on the control, passing to it the consumer and consumer connection point objects (along with the other required parameters), and that method determines the correct ID to use for the consumer's connection point. 同样, 在断开连接时, 可以调用方法, 而无需指定属性值。Similarly, when you disconnect, you can call the method without needing to specify the property value. > [!NOTE] > 当你将或其他服务器控件指定为使用者时, 可以确定使用者的连接点的 ID。The ID of a consumer's connection point can be determined when you designate a or other server control as a consumer. 必须标识使用者中的一个方法, 该方法检索由提供程序控件或转换器提供的接口的实例。You must identify a method in the consumer that retrieves an instance of an interface furnished by either a provider control or a transformer. 若要标识该方法, 请用`ConnectionConsumer` code 特性标记它。To identify the method, mark it with the `ConnectionConsumer` code attribute. 添加此属性时, 可以添加一个可选的字符串值参数, 该参数作为使用者对象的 ID。When you add this attribute, you can add an optional string value parameter that serves as an ID for the consumer's object. 如果为可选 ID 参数提供一个值, 该值将成为连接的属性的值。If you supply a value for the optional ID parameter, that value becomes the value of the property for the connection. 如果未提供 ID 值, 则使用属性值。If you do not supply an ID value, the property value is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性的声明性和编程使用。The following code example shows the declarative and programmatic use of the property. 该示例包含四个部分:The example has four parts: - 允许您在页上更改 Web 部件显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载所有控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到 .ascx 文件, 并为其提供分配给`Src`此用户控件的`Register`指令属性的文件名, 该属性位于宿主网页的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 此代码示例的第二部分是接口的源代码和使用者控件和提供者控件。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 请注意, 使用``和``元素在页标记中声明连接。Note that a connection is declared in the page markup, using the `` and `` elements. 连接声明包括必需`ConsumerConnectionPointID`的属性。The connection declaration includes the required `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attribute. 用于创建连接的另一种方法将在`Button1_Click`方法中显示, 其中, 代码使用使用者控件中定义的连接点创建新连接。A second method for creating the connection appears in the `Button1_Click` method, where the code creates a new connection, using the connection point defined in the consumer control. 然后, 在`Button2_Click`方法中, 代码访问属性。Then, in the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面后, 连接已存在, 因为在页面中声明了静态连接。After you load the page in a browser, a connection already exists because of the static connection declared in the page. 在提供程序控件中输入一些文本, 请注意, 由于连接的原因, 该文本将显示在使用者中。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that it is displayed in the consumer due to the connection. 接下来, 断开控件的连接。Next, disconnect the controls. 使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件, 将页面切换到连接模式。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, switch the page to connect mode. 单击其中一个控件上的谓词菜单 (由标题栏中的向下箭头表示), 然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 单击 "**断开连接**" 按钮。Click the **Disconnect** button. 使用 "**连接" Web 部件控件**按钮可以重新创建两个控件之间的连接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to recreate a connection between the two controls. 单击 "**器详细信息**" 按钮以运行访问属性值的代码。Click the **ConnectionPoint Details** button to run the code that accesses the property value. 值写出在控件下方的标签中。The value is written out in a label below the controls.

summary.span: 获取或设置连接上的属性值，该值引用作为该连接的使用者的 控件的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the control acting as a consumer for that connection.

value.span: 一个字符串，包含作为连接中的使用者的控件的 ID。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在控件之间创建连接时, 属性值是必需的。The property value is required when you create a connection between controls. 如果未将值分配给属性, 则当控件尝试激活连接时将引发异常。If a value is not assigned to the property, an exception is thrown when the control attempts to activate the connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性的声明性和编程使用。The following code example shows the declarative and programmatic use of the property. 该示例包含四个部分:The example has four parts: - 允许您在页上更改 Web 部件显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载所有控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到 .ascx 文件, 并为其提供分配给`Src`此用户控件的`Register`指令属性的文件名, 该属性位于宿主网页的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerID#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerID/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerID#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerID/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 此代码示例的第二部分是接口的源代码和使用者控件和提供者控件。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 对象当前是否已经建立并且能够在其提供者和使用者控件之间交换数据。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a object is currently established and able to exchange data between its provider and consumer controls.

value.span: 如果连接处于活动状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the connection is active; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示对象的状态。 The property indicates a state of a object. 当连接处于此状态时, 连接中的提供者和使用者控件将进行通信, 并能够通过公共接口或对象交换数据。When the connection is in this state, the provider and consumer controls in the connection are communicating and able to exchange data through a common interface or a object. 当用户查看在正常浏览模式下包含已建立连接的已呈现页面时, 该连接通常处于活动状态 (除非由于加载页面时出现某些冲突或其他问题, 否则该连接将失败)。When a user views a rendered page that includes an established connection in normal browse mode, the connection is typically active (unless it failed to be activated due to some conflict or other issue when the page loaded). 在页面和控件生命周期的早期阶段, 属性值为`false`。In the early stages of the page and control life cycle, the property value is `false`. 该连接将在引发 控件上的事件后立即激活。The connection is activated just after the event on the control is raised. 具体而言, 在使用者从提供程序或对象检索指定接口的实例后, 将激活连接。Specifically, the connection is activated after the consumer has retrieved an instance of the specified interface from the provider or a object. 当某个页面上有多个连接时, 知道连接是否处于活动状态是非常有用的。It is useful to know whether a connection is active in situations where there might be conflicts or synchronization issues due to multiple connections on a page. 例如, 如果两个连接之间存在某种冲突, 则控件可以选择不激活某个连接来避免冲突。For example, if there is some kind of conflict between two connections, the control has the option of not activating one of the connections to avoid the conflict. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates use of the property. 该示例包含三个部分:The example has three parts: - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载所有控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是接口的源代码和使用者控件和提供者控件。The first part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsActive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsActive/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsActive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsActive/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是一个`Register`指令, 该指令引用两个动态编译的控件的源代码。Near the top is a `Register` directive that refers to the source code for the two dynamically compiled controls. 静态连接在页面上的``元素中声明。The static connection is declared within the `` element on the page. `

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 对象是对所有用户可见还是仅对当前用户可见。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a object is visible to all users or only to the current user.

value.span: 如果连接是共享的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the connection is shared; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与各个控件一样 , 对象可以是共享或每个用户的实例。As with individual controls, a object can be a shared or a per-user instance. 共享实例表示连接对网页的所有用户可见, 而每个用户实例则意味着连接仅对特定用户可见。A shared instance means that the connection is visible to all users of a Web page, and a per-user instance means the connection is visible only to a specific user. 通常, 连接添加到页面的方式确定连接是否共享。In general, the way a connection is added to a page determines whether the connection is shared. 如果在网页的标记中声明了连接, 则连接将共享, 并且属性值为。 `true`If the connection is declared in the markup of a Web page, then the connection is shared and the property value is `true`. 此外, 如果添加连接时网页位于共享的个性化设置范围内, 则还会共享连接。In addition, if the Web page is in shared personalization scope when a connection is added, the connection is also shared. 通常情况下, 当用户使用``用户界面 (UI) 来添加连接时, 该页处于用户个性化设置范围内, 因此不会共享连接, 并且属性值为`false`。Typically, when a user uses the `` user interface (UI) to add a connection, the page is in user personalization scope, so the connection is not shared and the property value is `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 此代码示例包含五个部分:The code example has five parts: - 允许您在页上更改 Web 部件显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载所有控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - Web.config 文件中运行示例所需的项。An entry in the Web.config file that is required to run the example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到 .ascx 文件, 并为其提供分配给`Src`此用户控件的`Register`指令属性的文件名, 该属性位于宿主网页的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 此代码示例的第二部分是接口的源代码和使用者控件和提供者控件。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 在方法中, 它将检查现有连接的属性, 并在页面上显示结果。 `Button2_Click`In the `Button2_Click` method, it checks the property of the existing connection and displays the result on the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第四部分是 web.config 文件中的一个条目, 用户帐户需要该文件才能在共享个性化设置范围中编辑页面。The fourth part of the code example is an entry in the Web.config file that is required for the user account that will be running the example to be able to edit the page in shared personalization scope. 若要启用此设置, 您必须在 web.config 文件``中有一个与下面的示例类似的条目。To enable this, you must have an entry in the Web.config file within the `` section that looks like the following example. ``` ``` 在浏览器中加载页面后, 使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件切换页面以连接显示模式。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect display mode. 单击 "**连接" Web 部件控件**按钮以建立连接。Click the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to form a connection. 接下来, 单击 "**连接详细信息**" 按钮以显示连接是否共享。Next, click the **Connection Details** button to display whether the connection is shared. 如果在 "默认用户" 个性化设置范围中创建了与页面的连接 , 则该属性`false`的值应为 "连接"。If you created the connection with the page in the default user personalization scope, the property value should be `false` for the connection. 在其中一个控件的谓词菜单上 (由标题栏中的向下箭头指示), 单击 "连接" 谓词。On the verbs menu of one of the controls (indicated by the downward arrow in the title bar), click the connect verb. 连接 UI 出现时, 单击 "**断开**连接" 按钮以结束连接。When the connection UI appears, click the **Disconnect** button to end the connection. 使用 "**显示模式**" 控件将页面返回到浏览模式。Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode. 在 "**显示模式**" 控件中, 选择 "**共享**" 选项, 将页面切换到共享的个性化设置范围。In the **Display Mode** control, select the **Shared** option to switch the page into shared personalization scope. 按照上述步骤创建连接, 然后再次单击 "**连接详细信息**" 按钮以显示连接是否共享。Follow the same steps as those above to create a connection, and again click the **Connection Details** button to display whether the connection is shared. 在这种情况下, 属性的值应为。 `true`In this case, the value of the property should be `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件之间的连接可以是静态的, 也可以是动态的。Connections between Web Parts controls can be either static or dynamic. 静态连接是使用``元素在网页的标记中声明的。A static connection is declared in the markup of a Web page, using an `` element. 动态连接是通过编程方式或用户通过控件定义的用户界面 (UI) 创建连接时创建的。Dynamic connections are created programmatically or when a user creates a connection through the user interface (UI) defined by the control. 静态连接是共享对象, 这意味着它们可供网页的所有用户使用。Static connections are shared objects, meaning they are available to all users of the Web page. 而且, 它们实质上是永久性的, 因为像静态控件一样, 它们不能被永久删除。Also, they are essentially permanent because, like a static control, they cannot be permanently deleted. > [!NOTE] > 当无法永久删除静态连接对象时, 它可能会永久断开连接。While a static connection object cannot be permanently deleted, it can be permanently disconnected. 在这种情况下, 断开连接的对象将存在于服务器上, 但最终用户永远不会意识到对象在页面中的存在。In this case, the disconnected object would exist on the server, but an end user would never be aware of the object's existence in a page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property. 此代码示例包含三个部分:The code example has three parts: - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host the controls and run the code example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是接口的源代码和使用者控件和提供者控件。The first part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是一个`Register`指令, 该指令引用两个动态编译的控件的源代码。Near the top is a `Register` directive that refers to the source code for the two dynamically compiled controls. 静态连接在页面上的``元素中声明。The static connection is declared within the `` element on the page. `Button1_Click` 方法访问属性以检查连接是否为静态。The `Button1_Click` method accesses the property to check whether the connection is static. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic/CS/wpConnectIsStaticCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic/VB/wpConnectIsStaticVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 已创建静态连接。The static connection is already created. 在提供程序控件中输入一些文本, 并注意该文本显示在使用者控件中。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that the text is displayed in the consumer control. 单击 "**连接详细信息**" 按钮以显示属性的值。Click the **Connection Details** button to display the value of the property.

summary.span: 获取作为 Web 部件连接中的提供者的 控件。

span.span: Gets a control that acts as the provider in a Web Parts connection.
A that acts as the provider of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 Web 部件连接都包含两个控件--使用者和提供程序-- 并且属性返回对连接中提供程序控件的引用。Every Web Parts connection consists of two controls--a consumer and a provider--and the property returns a reference to the provider control in a connection. 与连接中的对应项 (使用者控件) 类似, 提供程序控件是建立连接所必需的。Like its counterpart in a connection (the consumer control), the provider control is required to establish a connection. 无论是以编程方式创建连接, 还是以页持久性格式声明, 都必须指定一个控件作为连接的访问接口。Whether you create the connection programmatically, or by declaring it in page persistence format, you must specify a control to act as the provider for a connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates use of the property. 此代码示例包含三个部分:The code example has three parts: - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host the controls and run the code example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是接口的源代码和使用者控件和提供者控件。The first part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是一个`Register`指令, 该指令引用两个动态编译的控件的源代码。Near the top is a `Register` directive that refers to the source code for the two dynamically compiled controls. 静态连接在页面上的``元素中声明。The static connection is declared within the `` element on the page. 请注意, 在``元素中`ProviderID` , 属性具有分配给它的提供程序控件的 ID。Notice that in the `` element, the `ProviderID` attribute has the ID of the provider control assigned to it. 这是为静态连接标识提供程序所必需的。This is required to identify the provider for the static connection. `Button1_Click` 方法访问属性, 并将其一些详细信息写入标签。The `Button1_Click` method accesses the property and writes some of its details to a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider/CS/wpConnectProviderCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider/VB/wpConnectProviderVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 已创建静态连接。The static connection is already created. 在提供程序控件中输入一些文本, 并注意该文本显示在使用者控件中。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that the text is displayed in the consumer control. 单击 "**提供程序详细信息**" 按钮可显示通过属性访问的某些属性值。Click the **Provider Details** button to display some of the property values accessed through the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderConnectionPoint As ProviderConnectionPoint

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象作为充当连接提供者的 控件的连接点。

span.span: Gets the object that serves as a connection point for a control acting as a provider for a connection.

value.span: 与连接中的提供者控件关联的 。

span.span: A associated with the provider control in a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在两个控件之间创建连接所必需的步骤之一是为每个控件创建连接点。One of the required steps for creating a connection between two controls is to create connection points for each control. 提供程序连接点是一个对象, 其中包含有关如何连接到用作提供者的控件的信息。The provider connection point is an object that contains the information about how to connect to the control acting as a provider. 在提供程序的源代码中, 其中一个方法必须用`ConnectionProvider`特性标识。In the provider's source code, one of the methods must be identified with the `ConnectionProvider` attribute. 与提供程序控件关联的包含有关方法和属性的详细信息, 包括方法的 ID、在用户界面 (UI) 中使用的显示名称, 以及方法可以返回给使用者的接口实例的类型。控件.The that is associated with a provider control contains details about the method and the attribute, including an ID for the method, a display name for use in the user interface (UI), and what type of interface instance the method can return to a consumer control. 这组有关提供程序的信息、其建立连接的方法以及它所提供的接口类型共同构成了一个提供程序连接点。This set of information about the provider, its method for forming connections, and the type of interface it provides, collectively forms a provider connection point. 默认情况下, 一次只能连接到一个对象。By default, a can connect to only one object at a time. 使用者可以将多个方法标识为可能使用者连接点, 但使用者只能以一个使用者的身份 (因此, 它的一个使用者连接点只能处于活动状态)。A consumer could have multiple methods identified as possible consumer connection points, but a consumer can only participate in one connection as a consumer (hence, only one of its consumer connection points can be active) at a time. 与此相反, 默认情况下可以连接到任意数量的对象。In contrast, a can connect to any number of objects by default. 例如, 提供邮政编码的提供者控件可以连接到多个使用者控件, 这些控件使用邮政编码创建各种类型的数据 (如天气数据、新闻等)。For example, a provider control that provides a postal code could be connected to multiple consumer controls that use a postal code to create various kinds of data based on a postal code, such as weather data, news, and so on. 可以通过重写属性 上的属性来更改此默认行为。This default behavior can be changed by overriding the property on the attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property. 该示例包含四个部分:The example has four parts: - 允许您在页上更改 Web 部件显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载所有控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到 .ascx 文件, 并为其提供分配给`Src`此用户控件的`Register`指令属性的文件名, 该属性位于宿主网页的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 此代码示例的第二部分是作为使用者和连接的提供程序的两个控件的源代码, 以及用于连接点的接口。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two controls that serve as the consumer and the provider for the connection, and an interface used for the connection points. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第三部分是承载控件的网页的代码, 并演示属性的用法。The third part of the code example is the code for the Web page that hosts the controls and demonstrates the use of the property. 在方法中, 创建建立连接所需的所有对象 ( 包括对象)。 `Button1_Click`In the `Button1_Click` method, all the objects required to form a connection are created, including a object. 请注意控件上对方法的调用。Note the call to the method on the control. 所有创建的对象都传递到方法以创建连接。The various created objects are all passed to the method to create the connection. 在方法中, 代码访问属性, 并显示连接点的一些详细信息。 `Button2_Click`In the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the property and displays some details of the connection point. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面后, 请使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件将页面切换到连接模式。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode. 单击其中一个控件上的谓词菜单 (由标题栏中的向下箭头表示), 然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 使用 "**连接" WebPart 控件**按钮或提供的连接 UI 在两个控件之间创建连接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, or the provided connection UI, to create a connection between the two controls. 单击 "**器详细信息**" 按钮以运行演示属性的代码。Click the **ConnectionPoint Details** button to run the code that demonstrates the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置连接上的属性值，该值引用作为该连接的提供者连接点的对象的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the object serving as the provider connection point for that connection.

value.span: 包含提供者连接点对象的 ID 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID for a provider connection point object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于在网页的标记中声明的静态连接, 开发人员可以通过为`ProviderConnectionPointID` ``元素的特性指定值来指定将用于连接的提供程序连接点。For a static connection declared in the markup of a Web page, developers can specify which provider connection point will be used for the connection by assigning a value to the `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute on the `` element. 如果未将值分配给属性, 则使用属性值。If a value is not assigned to the attribute, the property value is used. 创建动态 (编程) 连接时, 通常不应设置属性的值。When you create dynamic (programmatic) connections, normally you should not set the value of the property. 您可以直接对 控件调用方法, 向其传递提供程序和提供程序连接点对象 (以及其他必需的参数), 并且该方法将确定要用于提供程序连接的正确 ID。情况.You can simply call the method on the control, passing to it the provider and provider connection point objects (along with the other required parameters), and that method determines the correct ID to use for the provider's connection point. 同样, 在断开连接时, 可以调用方法, 而无需指定属性值。Similarly, when you disconnect, you can call the method without needing to specify the property value. > [!NOTE] > 当您将或其他服务器控件指定为提供程序时, 可以确定提供程序的连接点的 ID。The ID of a provider's connection point can be determined when you designate a or other server control as a provider. 必须标识提供程序中的回调方法, 该方法为包含使用者的数据的接口的实例提供服务。You must identify a callback method in the provider that serves an instance of an interface containing data to a consumer. 若要标识该方法, 请用`ConnectionProvider` code 特性标记它。To identify the method, mark it with the `ConnectionProvider` code attribute. 添加此属性时, 可以添加一个可选的字符串值参数, 该参数作为提供者对象的 ID。When you add this attribute, you can add an optional string value parameter that serves as an ID for the provider's object. 如果为可选 ID 参数提供一个值, 该值将成为连接的属性的值。If you supply a value for the optional ID parameter, that value becomes the value of the property for the connection. 如果未提供 ID 值, 则在创建对象时, 控件将分配默认 id。If you do not supply an ID value, the control assigns a default ID when the object is created. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性的声明性和编程使用。The following code example shows the declarative and programmatic use of the property. 该示例包含四个部分:The example has four parts: - 允许您在页上更改 Web 部件显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载所有控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到 .ascx 文件, 并为其提供分配给`Src`此用户控件的`Register`指令属性的文件名, 该属性位于宿主网页的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 此代码示例的第二部分是接口的源代码和使用者控件和提供者控件。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 请注意, 使用``和``元素在页标记中声明连接。Note that a connection is declared in the page markup, using the `` and `` elements. 连接声明包括必需`ProviderConnectionPointID`的属性。The connection declaration includes the required `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute. 用于创建连接的另一种方法将在`Button1_Click`方法中显示, 其中代码使用提供程序控件中定义的连接点 (和 ID) 创建新连接。A second method for creating the connection appears in the `Button1_Click` method, where the code creates a new connection, using the connection point (and the ID) defined in the provider control. 然后, 在`Button2_Click`方法中, 代码访问属性。Then, in the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面后, 连接已存在, 因为在页面中声明了静态连接。After you load the page in a browser, a connection already exists because of the static connection declared in the page. 在提供程序控件中输入一些文本, 请注意, 由于连接的原因, 该文本将显示在使用者中。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that it is displayed in the consumer due to the connection. 接下来, 断开控件的连接。Next, disconnect the controls. 使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件, 将页面切换到连接模式。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, switch the page to connect mode. 单击其中一个控件上的谓词菜单 (由标题栏中的向下箭头表示), 然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 单击 "**断开连接**" 按钮。Click the **Disconnect** button. 使用 "**连接" Web 部件控件**按钮可以重新创建两个控件之间的连接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to recreate a connection between the two controls. 单击 "**器详细信息**" 按钮以运行访问属性值的代码。Click the **ConnectionPoint Details** button to run the code that accesses the property value. 值写出在控件下方的标签中。The value is written out in a label below the controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建两个控件之间的连接时, 属性值是必需的。The property value is required when you create a connection between two controls. 如果未将值分配给属性, 则当控件尝试激活连接时将引发异常。If a value is not assigned to the property, an exception is thrown when the control attempts to activate the connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性的声明性和编程使用。The following code example shows the declarative and programmatic use of the property. 该示例包含四个部分:The example has four parts: - 允许您在页上更改 Web 部件显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载所有控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到 .ascx 文件, 并为其提供分配给`Src`此用户控件的`Register`指令属性的文件名, 该属性位于宿主网页的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderID/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderID/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面后, 连接已存在, 因为在页面中声明了静态连接。After you load the page in a browser, a connection already exists because of the static connection declared in the page. 在提供程序控件中输入一些文本, 请注意, 由于连接的原因, 该文本将显示在使用者中。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that it is displayed in the consumer due to the connection. 接下来, 断开控件的连接。Next, disconnect the controls. 为此, 请使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件将页面切换到连接模式。To do that, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode. 单击其中一个控件上的谓词菜单 (由标题栏中的向下箭头表示), 然后单击 "连接" 谓词。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 单击 "**断开连接**" 按钮, 控件将断开连接。Click the **Disconnect** button, and the controls are disconnected. 接下来, 使用 "**连接" WebPart 控件**按钮重新创建两个控件之间的连接。Next, use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to recreate a connection between the two controls. 单击 "**使用者详细信息**" 按钮以运行访问属性值的代码。Click the **Consumer Details** button to run the code that accesses the property value.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
