Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 重写继承的 方法，并返回连接对象的类型的简称。

span.span: Overrides the inherited method and returns a short type name for the connection object.

returns.span: 一个字符串，包含 的类型简称（非限定名称）。

span.span: A string that contains the short (unqualified) type name of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要用于控件设计器的便利。This method is used mostly for convenience by control designers. 它通过使用较短的类型名称 (而不是完全限定的类型名称) 来改善连接对象在设计视图中的显示方式。It improves how connection objects appear in Design view by using the shorter type name, as opposed to a fully qualified type name. 但是, 在你想要了解连接对象的类型名称的代码中的任何位置, 都可以调用方法。However, the method can be called at any point in your code where you want to know the type name of a connection object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法以返回对象的短类型名称。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to return the short type name of a object. 此代码示例包含三个部分:The code example has three parts: - 接口的源代码和两个用作连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host the controls and run the code example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是接口的源代码和使用者控件和提供者控件。The first part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练, 请参阅[演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是一个`Register`指令, 该指令引用两个动态编译的控件的源代码。Near the top is a `Register` directive that refers to the source code for the two dynamically compiled controls. 静态连接在页面上的``元素中声明。The static connection is declared within the `` element on the page. `Button1_Click` 方法调用方法来写入标签的连接的类型名称。The `Button1_Click` method calls the method to write the type name of the connection to a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString/CS/wpConnectToStringCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString/VB/wpConnectToStringVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 已创建静态连接。The static connection is already created. 在提供程序控件中输入一些文本, 并注意该文本显示在使用者控件中。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that the text is displayed in the consumer control. 单击 "**连接详细信息**" 按钮以执行方法。Click the **Connection Details** button to execute the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Transformer As WebPartTransformer

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，用于在 Web 部件连接中两个不兼容的连接点之间转换数据。

span.span: Gets a object that is used to transform data between two otherwise incompatible connection points in a Web Parts connection.
A .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 部件连接中, 连接中的提供者和使用者控件可以通过两种方式连接。In a Web Parts connection, there are two ways in which the provider and consumer controls in the connection can connect. 它们可以通过其各自的对象和两个控件都理解的接口类型来直接连接。They can connect directly, through their respective objects and an interface type that is understood by both controls. 或者, 如果它们不兼容, 则它们可以使用对象 (该对象可将接口实例从提供程序转换为使用者识别的类型) 间接连接。Or, if they are incompatible, they can connect indirectly, using a object that transforms an interface instance from a provider into a type understood by a consumer. 当需要转换器作为连接的一部分时, 属性提供对对象的引用。When a transformer is needed as part of a connection, the property provides a reference to the object. 可以通过在``元素中为自定义转换器 (或随 Web 部件控件集提供的转换器之一) 添加标记, 在网页的标记中以声明方式为连接添加转换器。You can add a transformer for a connection declaratively in the markup of a Web page, by adding a tag for a custom transformer (or one of the transformers provided with the Web Parts control set) within the `` element. 还可以通过编程方式添加转换器, 在代码中创建其实例, 并在 控件上调用方法来创建连接, 并向其传递转换器对象和其他所需的参数。You can also add a transformer programmatically, creating an instance of it in your code, and calling the method on the control to create the connection, passing to it the transformer object along with the other required parameters.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Transformers As WebPartTransformerCollection

summary.span: 获取由 Web 部件控件集内部使用的 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects used internally by the Web Parts control set.
A containing objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性绝不会供开发人员使用。The property is never intended for use by developers. 若要访问与连接关联的转换器, 开发人员应始终使用属性。To access the transformer associated with a connection, developers should always use the property. 属性由 Web 部件控件集在内部使用, 以使页面开发人员能够在网页标记中的``元素内声明转换器元素。 The property is used internally by the Web Parts control set to enable page developers to declare transformer elements within the `` element in the markup of a Web page.
